name: "Fuller House" - The Cast and Characters Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which character, who also appeared on three other television shows, was played by John Stamos?
questions.explanation:
Jesse Katsopolis.

	Stamos appeared in 170 episodes of "Full House" as the character, and also on one episode of "Hanging With Mr. Cooper" and an episode of "Late Night with Jimmy Fallon", both in character as Uncle Jesse. Stamos returned for four of the first 13 episodes of "Fuller House", the sequel set in real time 21 years after the end of the first series.

questions.text: Michelle Tanner did not return for "Fuller House", when neither actress who had played her wanted to return. Instead they killed the character off screen.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Twins Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen played the character during the initial run of "Full House". Both actresses, who have become fashion moguls, told producers that they no longer felt comfortable in front of a camera. The character however was not killed off, leaving the possibility of a return in a future episode possible.

questions.text: Which actress portrayed middle sister Stephanie Tanner?
questions.explanation:
Jodie Sweetin.

	Sweetin returned to the role she pioneered as a child actress in 1987. She debuted the role when she was just five-years-old. She appeared in 193 episodes of "Full House" and all 13 first-season episodes of "Fuller House".

questions.text: Kimmy Gibbler was the annoying neighbor and best friend to Stephanie on the original series, but returned as the landlord in "Fuller House".
questions.explanation:
False.

	Neither half of that is true. In "Full House" Gibbler was D.J. Tanner's best friend, she rarely got along with Stephanie. In the rebooted series she returns as a housemate, not the landlord. She is still D.J.'s best friend and agrees to move in to the house the Tanners grew up in.

questions.text: In "Full House" Danny Tanner was a widower. Which of his daughters took on the role of widow in "Fuller House"?
questions.explanation:
D.J.

	D.J., the eldest Tanner daughter, found herself in a very similar situation to that of her father at roughly the same age. She was a widow with a young family, three children and no one to help her raise them. Her sister Stephanie and best friend Kimmy fill out the roles of Jesse and Joey from "Full House".

questions.text: What is the last name of the child actors who play D.J. Tanner's youngest son?
questions.explanation:
Messitt.

	The twins, Fox and Dashiell Messitt play Tommy Fuller Jr. in all 13 season one episodes. Producer's hired twins to play the role in order to try to "capture the magic" of the original series. Having twins represent the character allowed the production work longer hours as well. When one of the child actors was at the end of his work day, the twin would then start his.

questions.text: The initial show was called "Full House" referencing the number of people who lived in it. What is the meaning of the title of this show?
questions.correct: Fuller is the last name of D.J.'s family.
options: There are more people in the house than ever.
The new house is smaller, so it appears to be more full despite a smaller cast.
The house has more furniture in it than it ever had before.
questions.explanation:
Fuller is the last name of D.J.'s family.

	There is a little double play in the title. The official reasoning that the house belongs to D.J.'s family so it is officially the Fuller household. The house actually had less people living in it during season one than it had in the last season of "Full House". The show is set in the same house as the first series.

questions.text: The Katsopolis twins from "Full House" returned for an episode of "Fuller House" like most of the original cast. What where their character names?
questions.explanation:
Nicky and Alex.

	The twins were played by Daniel and Kevin Renteria (season 5) Blake and Dylan Tuomy-Wilhoit (seasons 6-8) in a total of 81 episodes of "Full House". The Tuomy-Wilhoit twins returned to the roles of Nicky and Alex for the pilot of "Fuller House". The twins were brought into the original series when Jesse and his wife Becky had kids in the middle of the fifth season of the show.  The Renteria twins played the roles for the final 12 episodes of the fifth season and were replaced when the characters were aged up at the start of the next season.

questions.text: Who played the family patriarch, Danny Tanner?
questions.explanation:
Bob Saget.

	Saget, known for being a raunchy and dirty stand up comedian returned for two episodes of "Fuller House" as the clean freak Danny Tanner. Saget is know for both his role on "Full House" and for hosting several seasons of "America's Funniest Home Videos" at the same time. During several seasons he was the star of two of the rated television series on TV. Saget later spent 208 episodes doing the voice over on "How I Met Your Mother".

questions.text: Which of D.J. Tanner's high school boyfriends returned in season 1?
questions.explanation:
Steve.

	Among the options, only Steve had been a boyfriend of D.J.'s during her formative years on "Full House". Steve Hale, had been a boyfriend in high school and when he went off to college, over the course of several seasons of the first series. He appeared in a total of 50 episodes of "Full House". While not a main character, he did return for a few episodes in season one of "Fuller House".
